src:
Dalam Sehari, Prabowo Terima Dubes Korsel, Rusia, dan Yordania
05 Nov 2019, 20:59 by Lisye Sri Rahayu
Jakarta - Menteri Pertahanan (Menhan) Prabowo Subianto menerima kunjungan kehormatan dari beberapa duta besar negara sahabat. Prabowo telah menerima dubes dari Korea Selatan hingga Dubes Rusia.
Prabowo Subianto, pada Senin (4/11), menerima kunjungan kehormatan Dubes Korea Selatan untuk Indonesia, Kim Changbeon, yang didampingi Athan Capt (Navy) Jung Yeonsu dan First Secretary Ma Sungmin. Trenggono menyebut pertemuan tersebut adalah kunjungan kehormatan.
"Pada intinya courtesy call (kunjungan kehormatan), Dubes Korea juga pengin minta courtesy call sama saya juga," ujar Wamenhan Trenggono di Kemhan, Jalan Medan Merdeka Barat, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Sementara itu, Prabowo juga menerima kunjungan kehormatan dari Duta Besar Rusia untuk Indonesia, Lyudmila Georgievna Vorobieva, pada Senin (4/11) di kantor Kemhan. Pada pertemuan itu Prabowo didampingi oleh Sekjen Kemhan, Laksda TNI, Agus Setiadji.
Masih pada hari yang sama, Prabowo juga menerima kunjungan dari Duta Besar Yordania untuk Indonesia, Abdallah Suliman Abu Rohman. Prabowo juga didampingi oleh Sekjen Kemhan, Laksda TNI, Agus Setiadji dan Dirjen Strategi Pertahanan (Strahan), Mayor Jenderal TNI Rizerius Eko.

(lir/dnu)
text:
In a Day, Prabowo Received the Ambassador of South Korea, Russia and Jordan
05 Nov 2019, 20:59 by Lisye Sri Rahayu
Jakarta - Defense Minister (Defense) Prabowo Subianto received honorary visits from several ambassadors from friendly countries. Prabowo has received ambassadors from South Korea to the Russian ambassador.
Prabowo Subianto, on Monday (4/11), received an honorary visit from the South Korean Ambassador to Indonesia, Kim Changbeon, who was accompanied by Athan Capt (Navy) Jung Yeonsu and First Secretary Ma Sungmin. Trenggono called the meeting an honorary visit.
"In essence, a courtesy call, the Korean ambassador also wanted a courtesy call with me too," said the Deputy Minister of Trenggono at the Ministry of Defense, Jalan Medan Merdeka Barat, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Meanwhile, Prabowo also received an honorary visit from the Russian Ambassador to Indonesia, Lyudmila Georgievna Vorobieva, on Monday (4/11) at the Ministry of Defense's office. At the meeting Prabowo was accompanied by the Secretary General of the Ministry of Defense, Laksda TNI, Agus Setiadji.
Also on the same day, Prabowo also received a visit from the Jordanian Ambassador to Indonesia, Abdallah Suliman Abu Rohman. Prabowo was also accompanied by the Secretary General of the Ministry of Defense, Laksda TNI, Agus Setiadji and the Director General of Defense Strategy (Strahan), Maj. Gen. Rizerius Eko.

(hurdy / dnu)
